description: Almost-convex polygons of perimeter 2n on square lattice.
references: I. G. Enting, A. J. Guttmann, L. B. Richmond and N. C. Wormald, Enumeration of almost-convex polygons on the square lattice, Random Structures Algorithms 3 (1992), 445-461.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
